verses.verse: Don't become many teachers, my brothers, realizing that we will receive greater judgment.
You see, absolutely all of us slip often. If anyone does not slip in word, this person is a complete man, able to also bridle the whole body.
Look, we put the bridles into the mouths of the horses with the intent for them to be persuaded by us, and we lead their whole body about.
Look also at the boats being such big boats as these and being driven by harsh winds. It is led about by the smallest rudder to wherever the rushed impulse of the person steering intends.
This is also how the tongue is a little body part and brags about huge things. Look, a little fire starts such a large forest on fire.

And the tongue is a fire, the world of the wrong way. This is how the tongue is placed among our body parts: the tongue staining the whole body, igniting the running wheel of the birth, and being ignited by the Hinnom Valley.
You see, every nature of both wild animals and winged birds, of both reptiles and marine animals, is being tamed and has been tamed by the nature, the human nature,
but the tongue of people no one is able to tame. It is restless, bad, full of lethal poison.
With it, we confer prosperity on the God and Father, and with it we put curses on the people, the ones who have become in line with God's likeness.
From the same mouth comes a conferring of prosperity and a curse. My brothers, these things do not need to be happening like this.
The spring doesn't emit from the same cavity the sweet and the bitter, does it?
My brothers, a fig tree is not able to produce olives (or a vine, figs), is it? This is how not even one spring is able to produce salt and sweet water.
Who is insightful and intelligent among you? He must show his actions from the nice behavior in submissiveness of insight.
But if you have bitter passion and contention in your heart, do not brag and lie against the truth.
This insight is not coming down from above, but is earthly, of a soul, demonic.
You see, where passion and contention are, there is conflict and every useless item.
But the insight from above certainly is first consecrated, following that, peaceful, polite, easily persuaded, full of forgiving kindness and good fruits, not considering the wrong things, not faked.
The right way's fruit is seeded in peace for the people who make peace.
